files.patch:
@@ -72,1 +72,1 @@
-  UTIL_ARG_WITH(NAME: fine-debug-level, TYPE: string,
+  UTIL_ARG_WITH(NAME: debug-info-level, TYPE: string,
@@ -74,4 +74,4 @@
-    RESULT: FINE_DEBUG_LEVEL,
-    DESC: [Sets the fine-tuned debug level, when debug info generation is enabled],
-    DEFAULT_DESC: [from build debug level])
-  AC_SUBST(FINE_DEBUG_LEVEL)
+    RESULT: DEBUG_INFO_LEVEL,
+    DESC: [Sets the debug info level, when debug info generation is enabled (GCC and Clang only)],
+    DEFAULT_DESC: [default])
+  AC_SUBST(DEBUG_INFO_LEVEL)
@@ -103,3 +103,3 @@
-    FINE_DEBUG_LEVEL_FLAGS="-g${FINE_DEBUG_LEVEL}"
-    FLAGS_COMPILER_CHECK_ARGUMENTS(ARGUMENT: [${FINE_DEBUG_LEVEL_FLAGS}],
-        IF_FALSE: [FINE_DEBUG_LEVEL_FLAGS="-g"])
+    DEBUG_INFO_LEVEL_FLAGS="-g${DEBUG_INFO_LEVEL}"
+    FLAGS_COMPILER_CHECK_ARGUMENTS(ARGUMENT: [${DEBUG_INFO_LEVEL_FLAGS}],
+        IF_FALSE: [DEBUG_INFO_LEVEL_FLAGS="-g"])
@@ -107,3 +107,3 @@
-    # Fine debug level should follow the debug format to be effective.
-    CFLAGS_DEBUG_SYMBOLS="-gdwarf-4 ${FINE_DEBUG_LEVEL_FLAGS}"
-    ASFLAGS_DEBUG_SYMBOLS="${FINE_DEBUG_LEVEL_FLAGS}"
+    # Debug info level should follow the debug format to be effective.
+    CFLAGS_DEBUG_SYMBOLS="-gdwarf-4 ${DEBUG_INFO_LEVEL_FLAGS}"
+    ASFLAGS_DEBUG_SYMBOLS="${DEBUG_INFO_LEVEL_FLAGS}"
@@ -128,3 +128,3 @@
-    FINE_DEBUG_LEVEL_FLAGS="-g${FINE_DEBUG_LEVEL}"
-    FLAGS_COMPILER_CHECK_ARGUMENTS(ARGUMENT: [${FINE_DEBUG_LEVEL_FLAGS}],
-        IF_FALSE: [FINE_DEBUG_LEVEL_FLAGS="-g"])
+    DEBUG_INFO_LEVEL_FLAGS="-g${DEBUG_INFO_LEVEL}"
+    FLAGS_COMPILER_CHECK_ARGUMENTS(ARGUMENT: [${DEBUG_INFO_LEVEL_FLAGS}],
+        IF_FALSE: [DEBUG_INFO_LEVEL_FLAGS="-g"])
@@ -132,3 +132,3 @@
-    # Fine debug level should follow the debug format to be effective.
-    CFLAGS_DEBUG_SYMBOLS="${GDWARF_FLAGS} ${FINE_DEBUG_LEVEL_FLAGS}"
-    ASFLAGS_DEBUG_SYMBOLS="${FINE_DEBUG_LEVEL_FLAGS}"
+    # Debug info level should follow the debug format to be effective.
+    CFLAGS_DEBUG_SYMBOLS="${GDWARF_FLAGS} ${DEBUG_INFO_LEVEL_FLAGS}"
+    ASFLAGS_DEBUG_SYMBOLS="${DEBUG_INFO_LEVEL_FLAGS}"
